title: Build a Natural Language Processing Chatbot
description: Create a chatbot that can understand and respond to natural language queries
longDescription: Develop an intelligent chatbot that uses NLP techniques to understand user queries and provide relevant responses. The chatbot should be able to handle common customer service scenarios and maintain context throughout a conversation.

acceptanceCriteria: All dependencies are properly installed and working
Version control is set up with initial commit
Development environment is documented

details: Define the components of the chatbot system
acceptanceCriteria: Architecture diagram is created and documented
Conversation flow covers all required scenarios
NLP pipeline design is technically sound

details: Create training data for intent classification
acceptanceCriteria: Intent recognition has at least 85% accuracy
Model handles at least 10 different intents
Classification logic is properly tested

details: Create training data for entity extraction
acceptanceCriteria: Entity extraction has at least 80% accuracy
System can identify common entities like dates, names, and numbers
Entity extraction is properly tested
Responses are grammatically correct and natural
System maintains context across multiple turns
Response generation handles all defined intents

details: Design RESTful API for chatbot interaction
acceptanceCriteria: API follows RESTful principles
Endpoints are properly documented
Authentication and rate limiting are implemented

details: Create test cases for different scenarios
acceptanceCriteria: All test cases pass
User feedback is positive
Performance metrics meet or exceed targets

preparationSteps: Set up a virtual environment for the project
